left.item:
Innovation in Nutrition

Unique Foods for Individuals with Unique Needs

Vitaflo is dedicated to serving the metabolic community through innovative and specialized formulas for disease related malnutrition and rare metabolic disorders, including Phenylketonuria (PKU), Maple Syrup Urine Disease (MSUD), Tyrosinaemia (TYR), and Homocystinuria (HCU).

Our Comprehensive range of products offers flexibility and convenience, while meeting the unique dietary requirements related to amino acid metabolism disorders.
